meanings.definition: Capable of being solved or settled.
meanings.sent1: The puzzle was resolvable with a little help.
meanings.sent2: The conflict between the two friends was resolvable through communication.
meanings.sent3: The resolvable mystery turned out to be a simple misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: Her resolvable decision to take a break brought her peace of mind.
meanings.sent5: The resolvable problem at work was quickly tackled by the team.

meanings.definition: Able to be separated into components or parts.
meanings.sent1: The toy was resolvable into smaller pieces for easy storage.
meanings.sent2: The resolvable structure of the building allowed for easy renovations.
meanings.sent3: The resolvable cake was divided among the party guests.
meanings.sent4: His resolvable model airplane could be taken apart and put back together.
meanings.sent5: The resolvable jigsaw puzzle provided hours of entertainment.

meanings.definition: Able to be resolved or clarified.
meanings.sent1: The resolvable issue was quickly addressed by the team.
meanings.sent2: Her resolvable doubts were cleared up after talking to her mentor.
meanings.sent3: The resolvable misunderstanding led to a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: His resolvable confusion lifted once he read the instructions.
meanings.sent5: The resolvable question in class sparked an interesting discussion.
